#summary Common macros

Macroses, available in the any context (almost).

 * [Common_AltScreens Switch between Far windows by Alt-Number]

 * [Common_InputMacro Execute manually typed macros in the any context]

 * [Common_Wheel Speed up mouse wheel scrolling] (c) SimSU

 * [Common_F11 F11 - autoselect last used plugin in the plugins menu] (c) Maximus5

 * [Common_MacroAreaInfo Display current MacroArea/Dialog GUID information]
